TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OleDbTransaction extends System.Data.Common.DbTransaction
Public NotInheritable Class OleDbTransaction Inherits DbTransaction
public ref class OleDbTransaction sealed : System::Data::Common::DbTransaction

Docs.summary: Represents an SQL transaction to be made at a data source. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks L'applicazione crea un' <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction> oggetto chiamando <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> sul <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection> oggetto. Tutte le operazioni successive associate alla transazione (ad esempio, eseguire il commit o interrompere la transazione), vengono eseguite sul <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction> oggetto.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction Begin() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks La nuova transazione viene nidificata all'interno della transazione corrente.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction Begin(valuetype System.Data.IsolationLevel isolevel) cil managed
Public Function Begin (isolevel As IsolationLevel) As OleDbTransaction

Docs.param: The isolation level to use for the transaction.
Docs.summary: Initiates a nested database transaction and specifies the isolation level to use for the new transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks La nuova transazione viene nidificata all'interno della transazione corrente.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Commit() cil managed

remarks.format:
## Examples L'esempio seguente crea un' <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection> e un <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction>. Viene inoltre illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, una <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction.Commit%2A>, e <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction.Rollback%2A> metodi.
[!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Docs.exception: An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
The transaction has already been committed or rolled back. -or- The connection is broken.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Connection As OleDbConnection
public: property System::Data::OleDb::OleDbConnection ^ Connection { System::Data::OleDb::OleDbConnection ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the object associated with the transaction, or if the transaction is no longer valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Una singola applicazione può includere più connessioni di database, ognuna con zero o più transazioni. Questa proprietà consente di determinare l'oggetto connessione associato a una particolare transazione creata da <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property DbConnection As DbConnection
protected: virtual property System::Data::Common::DbConnection ^ DbConnection { System::Data::Common::DbConnection ^ get(); };
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property IsolationLevel As IsolationLevel
public: virtual property System::Data::IsolationLevel IsolationLevel { System::Data::IsolationLevel get(); };

Docs.value: Oggetto per questa transazione. Il valore predefinito è .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Le transazioni parallele non sono supportate. Pertanto, il <xref:System.Data.IsolationLevel> si applica all'intera transazione.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Rollback() cil managed

Docs.summary: Rolls back a transaction from a pending state.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Può solo essere il rollback della transazione da uno stato in sospeso (dopo <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> è stato chiamato, ma prima <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction.Commit%2A> viene chiamato). Verrà eseguito il rollback della transazione nel caso venga eliminata prima `Commit` o `Rollback` viene chiamato.
## Examples L'esempio seguente crea un' <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection> e un <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction>. Viene inoltre illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, una <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction.Commit%2A>, e <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction.Rollback%2A> metodi.
[!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Docs.exception: An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
The transaction has already been committed or rolled back. -or- The connection is broken.
